name: Bonk!
description:
VR physics-based game created for the Unreal Engine 4 Spring Jam 2020
https://itch.io/jam/2020-unreal-spring-jam

Find a way to get out from the frost office, use items to defend yourself and progress throught the level!

*** Developed and tested on Oculus Rift and Rift S ***

Inputs:
Move: Left Thumbstick Axis
Rotate: Right Thumbstick Axis
Jump: Press Right Thumbstick
Grab: Grip Left/Right

Hints:
- Find the lever to open the metallic gate
- Find the key inside the office
- Use the key to get out

Team:
Davide Merone - 3D Modeling and Texturing
Alessandro Palagano - Worldbuilding and Lighting
Henry Galimberti - Scripting and Physics
